member.name: N:Vestris.VMWareLib.Tools
member.summary: An add-on package that implements common guest operating system functions not directly supported by VixCOM. To get started, create an instance of , connect to the VMWare Workstation, Server or VI and create an instance of using the returned for further tasks.

member.name: N:Vestris.VMWareLib.Tools.Windows
member.summary: An add-on package that implements common guest operating system Windows functions not directly supported by VixCOM. To get started, create an instance of , connect to the VMWare Workstation, Server or VI and create an instance of using the returned for further tasks.
